answers.answer: Yes and it's very dangerous to both you and baby.
Yes...I'm on my 4th pregnancy and about to be 27 weeks...I am high risk b/c of my high blood pressure which caused me to have a seizure about a month ago
I had a seizure last week my bp was 179/179 and my sugar 280. Im 28wks but im being induce 6wks early due to servere Heart arrhythmia With me.

Really...they told me I'll prolly be having my baby at 36 weeks just to be on the safe side...but I've been taking medicine to keep my bp leveled but there's days it goes over 150/100 which gives me very bad migraines
I think you might have preeclampsia. Those are two sure signs right there...headaches and seizures. You should call your doc asap! Preeclampsia is not good for you or baby.
Have you talk to your doc yet??

question: I have high blood pressure with th pregnancy it's my 4th. And my question is can having high bp cause seizure epiosde?
title: seizures during pregnancy
